name: Universe Blockchain - Phase 1 (Private)
description: Developer-only permissioned testnet for Axiom Smart City internal testing

access.description: Only whitelisted addresses can submit transactions
access.publicLaunchDate: TBD - After 3-6 months of successful private operation

addresses.owner: REQUIRED - Your multi-sig address that controls the chain
validators: REQUIRED - Validator addresses (can be same as owner for Phase 1)
batchPosters: REQUIRED - Batch poster addresses (can be same as owner for Phase 1)
allowedSenders: REQUIRED - Any other addresses that need access
addresses.axmToken: REQUIRED - AXM ERC20 address on Arbitrum Sepolia

exitStrategy.ifSuccessful: Remove whitelist, complete audits, go public
exitStrategy.ifUnsuccessful: Gracefully shutdown, migrate back to Arbitrum One
exitStrategy.dataBackup: All transaction data posted to Arbitrum Sepolia (permanent record)
